shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.99;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(4),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(4),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq29);
per_frame_12=mq30=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq30);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q30=mq30;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=wave_r = 0.85 + 0.25*sin(0.437*time+1);
per_frame_19=wave_g = 0.85 + 0.25*sin(0.544*time+2);
per_frame_20=wave_b = 0.85 + 0.25*sin(0.751*time+3);
per_frame_21=rot = rot + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_22=cx = cx + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_23=cy = cy + 0.210*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_24=dx = dx + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_25=dy = dy + 0.003*( 0.60*sin(0.284*time) + 0.40*sin(0.247*time) );
per_frame_26=decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%6,0);
per_frame_27=dx = dx + dx_residual;
per_frame_28=dy = dy + dy_residual;
per_frame_29=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_30=dx_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2.13)*0.016*sin(time*7) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2.13))*dx_residual;
per_frame_31=dy_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2.13)*0.012*sin(time*9) + (1-equal(bass_thresh,2.13))*dy_residual;
per_frame_32=wave_x = wave_x - dx_residual*7;
per_frame_33=wave_y = wave_y - dy_residual*7;
per_frame_34=wave_mystery = time*0.03;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=//zoom = zoom + 0.005*( 0.60*sin(0.1934*time+3) + 0.40*sin(0.307*time+9) );
per_frame_37=//zoom = zoom + max(0,bass_att-1.1)*0.2;
per_frame_38=//warp = warp + max(0,treb_att-1.1)*1.0;
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=// this is a great way to respond to beats:
per_frame_41=// once you get one, let it decay at a constant rate!!
per_frame_42=rg = max(rg*0.77, 0.02 + 0.5*min(2,max(0,mid_att-1)*1.3));
per_frame_43=q9 = rg;
per_frame_44=
per_frame_45=zoom = zoom + q9*0.1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`
warp_4=`ret = GetBlur3(uv);
warp_5=`
warp_6=`uv *= (1+.1*GetPixel(saturate(ret.xy)));
warp_7=`uv -= .05*GetPixel(saturate(ret.xy));
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // sample previous frame
warp_11=`    ret.xyz = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_12=`
warp_13=`      // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_14=`      // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_15=`      ret.xyz += (ret.xyz - GetBlur2(uv))*0.3;
warp_16=`      ret.xyz *= 0.9;
warp_17=`
warp_18=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_19=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_20=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_21=`                      ).xyz*
warp_22=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_23=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_24=`                     );
warp_25=`if(ret.x> q21*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q24*roam_sin.x)ret.x += (noise9).x*1.5; 
warp_26=`if(ret.y> q22*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q25*roam_cos.x)ret.y -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_27=`if(ret.z> q23*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q26*roam_sin.y)ret.z *= (noise9).z*1.5; 
warp_28=`
warp_29=`      // add noise:
warp_30=`      float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.4 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_31=`      ret.xyz += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0 * 122 * saturate(treb_att-1);
warp_32=`
warp_33=`      // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_34=`      ret.xyz = lerp(ret.xyz, lum(ret.xyz), 0.2);
warp_35=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=` 
comp_4=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
comp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q28
comp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_8=`                      ).xyz*
comp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q30 
comp_11=`                     );
comp_12=`if(ret.x> q26*roam_cos.y && ret.x<= q23*roam_sin.x)ret.x *= (noise9).x*1.5; 
comp_13=`if(ret.y> q25*roam_sin.x && ret.y<= q22*roam_cos.x)ret.y += (noise9).y*1.5; 
comp_14=`if(ret.z> q24*roam_cos.x && ret.z<= q21*roam_sin.y)ret.z -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_15=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_16=`    ret *= ret; //darken
comp_17=`}
